Description: On I-495 at mile marker 47 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled tractor trailer. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 48.4 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On VA-49 in the Town of Victoria, in the vicinity of Rt. 1043E/W (Lunenburg County), motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south right lane and right shoulder are closed. The south entrance ramp narrows.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 7 in the County of Greensville, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On US-58 in the County of Scott, in the vicinity of Nottingham Rd; Rt. 614E/W (Scott County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed.
